introduction_blurb: Timeline blurb. This appears below the Timeline title and is usually a small paragraph in length.
introduction_image_alt: Alt text for the introduction image
panels_1_panel_text:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam pharetra ornare mauris nec placerat. Phasellus pharetra sem sit amet libero malesuada, vel sodales mauris porta.

Suspendisse molestie libero eu vestibulum commodo. Sed nulla urna, hendrerit et odio vitae, viverra dictum mauris. Vestibulum porttitor est ac consequat volutpat. Etiam eget luctus nisl, ac mattis urna.
panels_1_panel_image_alt: Alt text for the image accompanying panel 1
panels_1_panel_map_page: (No video/audio on this panel as we've set panel_map to FALSE. If TRUE, this field would be the vide/audio url.)
panels_1_panel_map_playlist: (No video/audio on this panel as we've set panel_map to FALSE. If TRUE, this field would be the video/audio PLAYLIST url.)
panels_1_panel_map_overlay: (No video/audio on this panel as we've set panel_map to FALSE. If TRUE, we'd set the overlay image icon here, e.g. play)
panels_2_panel_text: Vestibulum semper magna ac massa feugiat ultrices. Etiam facilisis massa id sem cursus, in elementum eros euismod. Integer blandit leo sed enim faucibus, semper tristique est placerat. Integer est orci, viverra sed egestas ac, feugiat et sem. Proin pharetra mauris sit amet odio euismod, nec semper urna gravida. In rutrum sem eget fringilla volutpat. Etiam et feugiat lorem.

panels_3_panel_text:
Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. Vestibulum accumsan orci vel augue convallis, ut luctus nisi sagittis. Pellentesque varius, turpis eu aliquet posuere, massa metus condimentum urna, dapibus pretium ipsum neque eget augue.

Nullam mollis convallis orci vel pulvinar. Sed venenatis facilisis justo, in dignissim diam molestie tempor.
